Text.Page:
Say, can you help me with something? I've been studying Mysterium reports on the strange giant butterflies infesting the Stronghold of Blood, and have noticed a disturbing pattern.

Normally, butterflies descend on an area, ravage it, then return to a central point.

But these show no signs of leaving the Stronghold of Blood, which is a serious problem for our evacuation plan.How can I help?

One of my men is in the fortress, gathering data.

If you don't mind, please find Kierhan and help him out.
Zeihenne is a former Essenia Guard who witnessed the crash. Since then she has been analyzing the movements of Mournwings and Murderwings.

These creatures maintain certain numbers, no matter how many I kill.

Why they're here... where they came from... we've got too many questions and not enough answers.

You up for a bug hunt?
Am I ever!

With both of us hunting, we should make a big dent in their numbers.

Hopefully, I can see some sort of pattern in their migrations, that should tell us what they're doing here.

Hopefully.

You're back.
I was right!
The newer butterflies are following a different flight pattern. It's almost like they're...searching for something.

We've got to get this report to Ziehenne!

According to this data, the central point of the migration must be...here.

That's where we should start looking. And by we, I mean you.

What was that?
I've never seen something like it...

You seem to know something.

Does that have anything to do with those crazy giant butterflies?"It's complicated..."

If you ever see something like that again, try and capture it alive!

It would be an invaluable research subject.
